title: Sun Transit in Fourth House: Inner Security, Home Authority, and Emotional Foundations
summary: For Pisces Ascendant, the Sun transiting the fourth house brings focus to home, emotional security, and inner stability. Matters related to residence, property, and family responsibilities come to the forefront. You may take a leadership role within the household or feel the need to establish authority in domestic matters. Emotional sensitivity increases, especially regarding personal comfort and peace of mind. When warmth is balanced with authority, this transit strengthens inner confidence, stable foundations, and a sense of rooted purpose.
closing: Sun in the fourth house teaches Pisces Ascendants that true strength comes from inner security and balanced authority at home.
